author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:
This PR: 
integrates the E/gamma emulation into the existing PF setup. No changes are expected on PF side, and the performance of the new e/gamma should be broadly compatible with the old one

adds the PF & E/gamma emulators based on HLS datafomats. These are provided in a separate file, L1Trigger/Phase2L1ParticleFlow/python/l1ctLayer1_cff.py producing a collections of PF & Puppi candidates called l1ctLayer1:PF and l1ctLayer1:Puppi and of e/gamma candidates l1ctLayer1EG.

#### PR validation:

Rebase from https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/893

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Rebase from https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/893
title: L1T phase-2 Update old PF emulators with E/gamma integration, and add new emulators (12_0_X version)
